detaileddescription.para: Traceability - SWR and SWDD The traceability between SWR and SWDD (model and implementation) is established on SW unit and function/code level by requirements identifier links. The overview of the requirements allocation on file level can be found here: TODO LINK (TODO overview generator: list of req - list in which file implemented) The overview of the requirements allocation on function level can be found here: TODO LINK (TODO overview generator: list of req - list in which function implemented)

Traceability - SWA and SWDD The traceability between SWA and SWDD is established by using an identical component name. Traceability - SWDD and Implementation The traceability between SWDD and implementation is established by using identical sw unit names (in SWDD and implementation).
